release.change: Added more detailed BT stats for Marshmallow
Fix for stats not showing when app has no root but batterystats perms
Added Doze mode stats for Marshmallow Devices
Experimental: get BATTERY_INFO permissions without system app (root only)
Removed requirement for root (when system app in installed)
Fixed API and non-API access to alarms on Marshmallow
Fixed various FC conditions from gplay crash reports
Moved credits and changelog to about screen
